text: Hi, Can we update/edit the total revenue field in the HubSpot via UI / API? If anyone can answer to this?

In case someone comes across this like I just did, your theme must be available for new content from <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/themes#theme-json|theme.json> to be validated by lighthouse-score `"is_available_for_new_content" : true`
